article.title: Common Vulnerability Scoring System

content.brief: The Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) sets out to provide a robust and useful scoring system for IT vulnerabilities that is fit for the future. Its development has been overseen by the CVSS Special Interest Group (SIG) with input from representatives of a broad range of industry sectors, from banking and finance to technology and academia.

article.source: Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams
